Tongue-tie
Some babies are born with a 
tight piece of skin between the 
underside of their tongue and 
the	floor	of	their	mouth.	This	
is known as tongue-tie, and 
while	it	doesnâ€™t	always	affect	
breastfeeding, it can make 
feeding painful in some cases 
as it is harder for your baby to 
attach to your breast.

easily with a minor surgical 
procedure called a frenulotomy
